titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to adjust the death benefit limits for certain policies purchased to cover payment of burial expenses or in connection with prearranged funeral expenses.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/18/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the death benefit limits and provide an inflation adjustment for certain life insurance policies purchased to cover payment of burial expenses or in connection with prearranged funeral expenses.
